name: Neighborhood Nightmare
description: Terrifying tales of oddball outsiders, fiendish friends, and ghoulish gatherings.

skinlines.name: Fright Night
skinlines.description: Bounding across the land on gargantuan frog legs, the Toadstool Boarding House attracts lodgers of the most frightful variety. Regardless of where it settles, there is always a monster in need of a place to stay, and Mother Glasc is always there to welcome them into the family with open arms. And an endless labyrinth of rooms ensures that none are ever turned away.
